Overview  Package   Extension 

org::fornax::utilities::xtendtools::lib
Extension strings

This extension provides several string processing functions from or inspired by StringUtils of the Apache Commons Lang project.
Author:
Ingo Feltes
Function Summmary
List[String]parse(String str, String pattern)
    Matches the string against the regex pattern and returns a list of strings representing the matched groups.
Stringchomp(String this)
    Removes one newline from end of a String if it's there, otherwise leave it alone.
Stringchomp(String this, String separator)
    Removes separator from the end of str if it's there, otherwise leave it alone.
Stringchop(String this)
    Remove the last character from a String.
Stringrepeat(String this, Integer repeat)
    Repeat a String repeat times to form a new String.
Stringrepeat(String this, String separator, Integer repeat)
    Repeat a String repeat times to form a new String, with a String separator injected each time.
Stringreplace(String this, String searchString, String replacement)
    Replaces all occurrences of a String within another String.
List[String]splitByWholeSeparatorPreserveAllTokens(String str, String separator)
    Splits the provided text into an array, separator string specified.
Stringsubstring(String str, Integer start)
    Gets a substring from the specified String avoiding exceptions.
Stringsubstring(String str, Integer start, Integer end)
    Gets a substring from the specified String avoiding exceptions.
StringsubstringAfter(String str, String separator)
    Gets the substring after the first occurrence of a separator.
StringsubstringAfterLast(String this, String separator)
    Gets the substring after the last occurrence of a separator.
StringsubstringBefore(String str, String separator)
    Gets the substring before the first occurrence of a separator.
StringsubstringBeforeLast(String str, String separator)
    Gets the substring before the last occurrence of a separator.
StringremoveStart(String str, String remove)
    Removes a substring only if it is at the begining of a source string, otherwise returns the source string.
StringremoveEnd(String str, String remove)
    Removes a substring only if it is at the end of a source string, otherwise returns the source string.
Stringjoin(List[String] collection, String separator)
    Joins the elements of the provided Collection into a single String containing the provided elements.
BooleanisEmpty(String this)
    Checks if a String is empty ("") or null.
BooleanisNotEmpty(String this)
    Checks if a String is not empty ("") and not null.
BooleanisBlank(String this)
    Checks if a String is whitespace, empty ("") or null.
BooleanisNotBlank(String this)
    Checks if a String is not empty (""), not null and not whitespace only.
